title: Update Shopify order tags when a Onfleet event happens
author: James Li
readme:
**Summary**

Onfleet is a last-mile delivery software that provides end-to-end route planning, dispatch, communication, and analytics to handle the heavy lifting while you can focus on your customers.

This workflow template automatically updates the tags for a Shopify Order when an Onfleet event occurs.

**Configurations**

  * Update the Onfleet trigger node with your own Onfleet credentials, to register for an **Onfleet API key** , please visit <https://onfleet.com/signup> to get started
  * You can easily change which Onfleet event to listen to. Learn more about Onfleet webhooks with [Onfleet Support](https://support.onfleet.com/hc/en-us/articles/360045763852-Webhooks)
  * Update the Shopify node with your Shopify credentials and add your own tags to the Shopify Order

readme_zh:
**概述**

Onfleet是一款终端配送管理软件，提供从路线规划、任务派发、实时通讯到数据分析的全流程解决方案，为您分担物流运营压力，让您能专注于服务客户。

此工作流模板可在Onfleet触发事件时，自动更新Shopify订单的标签。

**配置说明**

  * 在Onfleet触发节点中配置您的账户凭证。如需注册**Onfleet API密钥**，请访问<https://onfleet.com/signup>完成开户
  * 可自由设定需要监听的Onfleet事件类型。更多关于Onfleet网络钩子的信息，请参阅[Onfleet官方支持文档](https://support.onfleet.com/hc/en-us/articles/360045763852-Webhooks)
  * 在Shopify节点中配置您的店铺凭证，并为Shopify订单添加自定义标签

（注：根据技术文档翻译规范，保留"webhooks"专业术语不译，采用"网络钩子"这一通用译法；"last-mile delivery"译为"终端配送"符合物流行业术语；"handle the heavy lifting"采用意译"分担运营压力"更符合中文表达习惯；保持所有超链接及品牌名称原貌）
